casebody.data:
SHIVERS v. WARDEN OF MARYLAND PENITENTIARY [H. C. No. 8,

September Term, 1958.]

Decided October 23, 1958.

Before Bruñe, C. and Henderson, Hammond, Prescott and Horney, JJ.

PER Curiam.

This is an application by Calvin Shivers for leave to appeal from the denial of a writ of habeas corpus. All the allegations now raised were considered by this Court in a former application by this petitioner for leave to appeal, and rejected. Shivers v. Warden, 211 Md. 612. We are not persuaded now that we were wrong before.

Application denied, with costs.
